caption:
"A possibly metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Ambiguous function between wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in workshop environment near assembly parts."

"A white plastic container-type object with a cylindrical shape and a lid. The tapered rim suggests it may be used for storage. Located on the floor near a doorway, possibly containing cleaning supplies or household items."

"A glossy ceramic mug with deep blue coloring and rounded shape. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Made for holding hot drinks. Sitting beside a coffee maker and jar of beans on a kitchen counter."
